tool_description: The EU VAT Number Validation API verifies the format and validity of EU VAT numbers and retrieves company information such as name, address, country code and VAT number. It returns a detailed response.
title: EU VAT Number Checker

api_list.name: Check 1 param
api_list.description: Get details (1 param: full vat number, with country code)

api_list.name: Check 2 params
